meta.name: Tarot of Productivity Pack
meta.description: Forty satirical productivity tarot cards and spread definitions.

cards.name: The Calendar Kraken
cards.meaning_upright: The Calendar Kraken upright signals practical momentum: define the owner, narrow scope, and ship the reversible move (1).
cards.meaning_reversed: The Calendar Kraken reversed warns that noise is replacing judgment; pause, clarify assumptions, and reduce blast radius (1).
cards.action_prompt: What single action today would move overcommitment from vague intention to observable progress?
cards.warning: Avoid performative urgency while this card is active.
